refnamediv.refpurpose: Tool to clean a DICOM file.

para.literallayout: gdcmclean [options] file-in file-out gdcmclean [options] dir-in dir-out

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: The gdcmclean tool is an cleaning tool.

para.literallayout:
file-in DICOM input filename
file-out DICOM output filename

file-in DICOM input directory
file-out DICOM output directory
-i --input DICOM filename / directory -o --output DICOM filename / directory -r --recursive recursively process (sub-)directories. --continue Do not stop when file found is not DICOM.

--empty %d,%d DICOM tag(s) to empty %d,%d,%s DICOM private tag(s) to empty %s DICOM keyword/path(s) to empty --remove %d,%d DICOM tag(s) to remove %d,%d,%s DICOM private tag(s) to remove %s DICOM keyword/path(s) to remove --wipe %d,%d DICOM tag(s) to wipe %d,%d,%s DICOM private tag(s) to wipe %s DICOM keyword/path(s) to wipe --preserve %s DICOM path(s) to preserve --preserve-missing-private-creator Whether or not preserve private attributes with missing private creator. --preserve-group-length Whether or not preserve deprecated group length attributes (will not be re-computed). --preserve-illegal Whether or not preserve illegal attributes (eg. group 0003...).

-h --help print this help text and exit
-v --version print version information and exit
-V --verbose verbose mode (warning+error).
-W --warning warning mode, print warning information
-E --error error mode, print error information
-D --debug debug mode, print debug information

refsection.title: Editing mode
refsection.para: This functionality is not described in the DICOM standard.

The following example shows how to use editing mode and achieve 3 operations at the same time:
Empty the tag (0010,0010) Patient's Name,
Empty the private tag (0009,0020) Patient ID,
Remove the tag (0010,0040) Patient's Sex
Remove the tag (0010,1010) Patient's Age
Wipe the tag (0010,1030) Patient's Weight with the value '10'
